### Invitation to Qualify: Stage 2 of Cape Breton Highlands National Park Trails Rehabilitation Project
#### [English and French Titles]
**Stage 2 - Cape Breton Highlands National Park Trails Rehabilitation Project**
[**Projet de réhabilitation des sentiers du parc national des Hautes-Terres du Cap-Breton - Phase 2**](https://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/srch/rcs-eng.asp)

#### [Reference Information]
* Reference Number: cb-5636-57141226  
* Amendment Number: 1  
* Solicitation Number: 5P468-23-0014/A  
* Publication Date: 2023-05-19  
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-23T14:00:00  

#### [Project Summary]
Parks Canada Agency (PCA) invites contractors to participate in the Stage 2 of the Cape Breton Highlands National Park Trails Rehabilitation Project. This project aims to repair and reconstruct hiking trails in the national park, following damage caused by flooding in November 2021. The successful bidder will be responsible for constructing up to 20 km of trails, divided into 3 trails and 6 segments. Archaeology testing is required prior to any construction activity, which will be undertaken by Parks Canada.

#### [Key Requirements]
* *Exterior grounds maintenance* ([Entretien des sols extérieurs](https://www.unspsc.org/unspsc_codes/ UNSPSC89))
* The project includes construction of 20 km of hiking trail, with an expected completion date by March 31, 2025.

#### [Solicitation Process]
The tendering process consists of a two-stage evaluation process. Stage 1 evaluated the qualifications of interested suppliers, and this Stage 2 invites qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to participate.

#### [Additional Information]
* Contractor Address: Parks Canada Agency, 111 Water Street East, Cornwall, ON K6H 6S2
* Contact Person: Sheldon Lalonde, phone: 343 585 3836, email: sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca

Please refer to the Government of Canada's Get Noticed* portal for the complete tender document. Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or require additional information. We appreciate your interest in this project and look forward to receiving your submission. [**French Version Available**](../파준하고복우쪽와립우
